description: This file defines a React context for managing theming in a frontend application. It includes hooks for accessing theme data and a provider component that manages theme state with persistence.

methods.name: useTheme
methods.description: Hook to access the current theme object, throws an error if used outside ThemeProvider.

methods.name: useThemeController
methods.description: Hook to access the theme context, including changeTheme action.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: React functional component that provides theme context with state management and persistence.
